message: Let's split it fairly, I'll take a bit more since I'm the first to propose.
I'll take a bit more since I'm the one who rejected your offer. You can't outsmart me!
You think you're clever, but I'm not falling for it. I'll wait for a better offer.
I'll meet you in the middle, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'll give you a fair shot this time, but don't expect any more favors!
Okay, okay, I'll take it. But don't think this means I'm going easy on you next time!
